product>>description: New from the fragrance masters at Illume, Anatomy of a Fragrance bath and beauty products are sophisticated, lighthearted luxuries. Each is crafted in Minnesota, where Illume combines their signature scents with beautiful packaging designed in-house. From lavish hand creams to triple-milled soaps to nature-inspired perfumes, their line is ready-made for gifting and indulging. **Honey Rose**: a warm, romantic scent with notes of lily of the valley, sandalwood and bergamot **Orchid Vanille**: a bright, fresh combination of orange blossom, jasmine, black currant and praline **Wildflower Bergamot**: A zesty blend of bergamot, lemon and mango layered with cedar and sandalwood
product>>name: Anatomy of a Fragrance Gift Set

product>>description: Capri Blue's iconic vessels and fragrances - proudly designed and poured in Mississippi - are a long-standing favorite at Anthropologie. The line pairs striking visuals with intoxicating scents to create beautifully aromatic products like soy-blended candles and vegan-formulated beauty care. **Volcano**: tropical fruits, sugared oranges, lemons and limes, redolent with lightly exotic mountain greens **Coastal**: notes of pineapple, verbena and coconut, accented by sparkling lemon, bergamot and grapefruit **Fir & Firewood**: a fruity, green aroma of apple, clove, fir, pine needle, white birch, cedar, vetiver and musk **Japanese Quince & Cedar**: aromatic cedar wood is embellished with sun-ripened cassis, sugared quince, accents of red currant and a splash of sparkling pomelo **Gardenia & Fig**: bright greens and fresh peach mingle with gardenia, rose, ylang ylang and coconut over a base of light musk **Cinnamon Toddy**: a mouthwatering medley of ripe apple, warm cinnamon, golden clove and grated nutmeg topped with notes of honey and maple **Spiced Cider**: nutmeg, clove and cinnamon are layered over fresh apple and juicy orange notes **Lagoon**: top notes of freesia, incense and tamarind blend over a musky base of cashmere, wood and vetiver **Grapefruit Neroli**: sun-kissed grapefruit, quince and tangerine over neroli, vanilla, orchid and currant
product>>variations: Fir and Firewood|Spiced Cider|Volcano|Spiced Cider|Fir and Firewood|Volcano|Volcano

product>>description: A former knitwear designer, the British artist tackled a year-long project of painting a different pup every day, resulting in a wildly popular gallery show at our Kings Road store and this exclusive tableware for your home
Sometimes, the best way to make a statement is to spell it out. We recommend gleaming brass and a sizable pendant.
Incredibly soft, plush faux fur is the best way to wrap your loved ones in the epitome of cozy.

Over ten years ago, husband and wife team Troy and Traci Arntsen began creating scented candles right in their home kitchen. Today, the couple own and operate Voluspa, an internationally renowned home fragrance label beloved for their signature coconut wax blends and luxurious packaging. Here, etched glass and warm, alluring scents fill the room with an aromatic glow. Gift to your dearest gal pal or a hard-to-please hostess. **Mokara**: orchid, white lily and spring moss (FLORAL) **Goji Tarocco Orange**: cold-pressed tarocco orange blended with sun-dried goji berries (FRESH) **French Cade & Lavender**: a refreshing blend of French cadewood, lavender, verbena and moss (FLORAL) **Baltic Amber**: forest scents of sandalwood and cedar (SPICE) **Panjore Lychee**: a citrus-tinged blend of cassis and Asian pear (FLORAL) **Crane Flower**: ripened grapefruit combines with geranium, lavender and nectar inspired by the Birds of Paradise flower (FLORAL) **Santiago Huckleberry**: sweet and spicy, with hints of vanilla pod and sugarcane (FRESH) **Gilt Pomander & Hinoki**: holly berries, cardamom and hinoki warm heart and hearth alike
product>>name: Limited Edition Voluspa Cut Glass Jar Candle
product>>variations: Gilt Pomander & Hinoki|Mokara|Goji Tarocco Orange|French Cade Lavender|Baltic Amber|Panjore Lychee|Crane Flower|Santiago Huckleberry

product>>description: With a 20-year legacy, Minnesota-based fragrance label Illume is best known for its luxuriously-scented, clean-burning candles. Each signature scent is crafted by hand from all-natural, food-grade ingredients like coconut wax and essential oils, creating an inviting atmosphere wherever one is lit. The mouthwatering aromas of French desserts arise from the nourishing balms in this giftable set. **Sweet Vanilla & Cinnamon**: a comforting blend of nutmeg, vanilla bean and cinnamon crust (SPICE) **Vanilla & Fig**: a perfect blend of lush vanilla, orchid petals, figwood and black mission figs (SPICE) **Whipped Cream & Pear**: a decadent infusion of warm vanilla, fresh pear, whipping cream and a hint of apple peel (FRESH)

Over ten years ago, husband and wife team Troy and Traci Arntsen began creating scented candles right in their home kitchen. Today, the couple own and operate Voluspa, an internationally renowned home fragrance label beloved for their signature coconut wax blends and luxurious packaging. *First Set* **Prosecco Rose**: refreshing, sparkling pink prosecco and rose petals (FLORAL) **Branche Vermeil**: a winter spruce infused with notes of citron, balsam wood and sugar (WOODSY) **Blond Tabac**: notes of warm perique tobacco and vanilla husk layered with sandalwood (SPICE) **Bourbon Vanille**: fragrant vanilla beans - ground and distilled for extract (SPICE) *Second Set* **Aurantia & Blackberry**: notes of aurantia wood, ripe blackberry, and fresh acai (WOODSY) **Casa Pacifica**: a fresh spray of sea salt, shore brush and California driftwood (FRESH) **Makassar Ebony & Peach**: a fragrant blend of ebony wood, ripe peach and apple blossom (SPICE) **Perse Bloom**: a bouquet of peony, night jasmine and Egyptian mimosa (FLORAL)
product>>name: Voluspa Maison Mini Candle Gift Set

Each is crafted in Minnesota, where Illume combines their signature scents with beautiful packaging designed in-house. From lavish hand creams to triple-milled soaps to nature-inspired perfumes, their line is ready-made for gifting and indulging. **Honey Rose**: a warm, romantic scent with notes of lily of the valley, sandalwood and bergamot **Orchid Vanille**: a bright, fresh combination of orange blossom, jasmine, black currant and praline **Wildflower Bergamot**: A zesty blend of bergamot, lemon and mango layered with cedar and sandalwood

product>>description: A perfect stocking stuffer, this earring set allows her to swap out posts to suit her style

After immigrating to Miami, Italian native Valeria Campello founded Cosabella with the intention of bringing delicate, Italian-made lingerie to the states. After years of working closely with Italian vendors and American customers, Campello had become a savvy, knowledgeable businesswoman herself, and re-launched Cosabella as her own brand of luxe, feminine undergarments made from high-quality Italian textiles. Now a family-owned business, Cosabella is beloved for its comfortable, endlessly romantic pieces meant for everyday wear.

Guided by his vision to create fashion that eschewed the trends of his time, Arthur Lasenby Liberty created the iconic Liberty London in 1875. Housed in a mock-Tudor building on Great Marlborough Street, the brand is widely known for the eclectic prints that define its line of luxury fabrics, accessories and home goods. A time-honored haven for those with a penchant for ornamentation, Liberty has formed a legacy rooted in its exceptionally crafted designs and its decidedly British sensibilities. **Sophie Jane**: in a print drawn from Liberty's "Plants that Changed the World" collection, tea and coffee mingle amongst blooming periwinkles and fragrant pinks, celebrating British history and traditions - and of course, the joy of a good, hot beverage. **Wiltshire Berry:** originally designed in 1939, this classic Liberty print - with its repeating leaf and berry pattern - is a well-loved motif with decades of history. **Peacock Orchard:** exotic birds perch and play in a forest of fruit trees and foliage on this conversational print, which draws its inspiration from an archived Liberty artwork. **Nina Taylor:** originally designed for a seasonal collection inspired by William Morris's poem, "Earthly Paradise," this hand-drawn sandalwood print recalls the charm and beauty of the visible world.
product>>name: Liberty for Anthropologie Cheese Spreader Set

product>>description: When taken as a daily shot of extra nutritional support, each bio-fermented, certified organic, probiotic elixir promotes a radiant complexion and protects your skin and body from free-radical damage, dryness and signs of aging. The Beauty Chef's line of nutrient-dense supplements, serums, balms and boosts are organic, naturopathic and sustainably handcrafted in the founder's hometown of Bondi Beach, Australia. Each formula is packed with collagen- stimulating proteins, detoxifying cruciferous veggies, antioxidant-rich berries and other garden-grown wonders. **Hydration Boost**: Organic coconut water, aloe vera and lemon myrtle combat dullness, and improve digestive health and overall circulation. **Collagen Boost**: An antioxidant-rich berry blend increases the skin's production of plumping collagen, combats cellular damage and supports the growth of hair and nails. **Antioxidant Boost**: An enzyme-packed formula of papaya, pomegranate, green tea and vitamin E combats fatigue and boosts overall skin radiance and firmness.
This geo-printed set comes in an eclectic palette of complementary hues.

In 2007, partners Josh Kilmer-Purcell and Brent Ridge bought the historic Beekman 1802 farm as a weekend escape from their busy NYC lives. Today - thanks to the help of nearby neighbors who helped them produce their first batch of cheese and soaps from goat's milk - the brand is widely known for its artisan-made goods centered around seasonal living and neighborly sharing. **Aloe & Iris**: a soft, soothing blend of refreshing aloe and iris **Fragrance Free**: naturally scented and formulated for sensitive skin **Honey & Oats**: exfoliating oats with notes of honey and apricot **Honeysuckle & Moss**: a bright blend of honeysuckle, cyclamen, jasmine, and fresh moss **Linden**: a bouquet of linden blossoms, lotus and water orchid with a soft amber base **Oak Moss**: woodsy and aromatic, with notes of warm amber and chypre shea **Sweet Autumn Clematis**: scented with notes of sweet autumn clematis, jasmine, and a hint of almond
product>>name: Beekman 1802 Goat Milk Travel Soap Set

product>>description: For a gift that will impress, choose one of these lovely jewelry sets - each comes with a trinket dish she's sure to treasure.
product>>name: Sweet Nothings Trinket Dish Gift Set

product>>description: Husband-and-wife duo Kate and Lance Smith started Kalastyle over twenty years ago in a New England farmhouse. The brand has grown, but this family business remains true to its roots: a modern aesthetic, eco-awareness and simple, high- quality products. Their organic soaps use only natural ingredients to exfoliate, deep-clean and hydrate your skin. **Seaweed**: formulated for dry skin using active marine algae **Sea Salt**: sea salt soften appearance of skin **Sea Aster**: soothes appearance of redness

Sunday Riley is a line of layer-able formulas that unite the most advanced breakthroughs in cosmetic science with pure, potent botanicals. Each technology-driven blend delivers active ingredients at maximum concentration, guaranteeing noticeable anti-aging benefits, long-term rejuvenation and instant, luminous results. This powerful daily or overnight treatment is infused with skin-brightening licorice, rejuvenating squalene and soothing arnica that work to reduce wrinkles, improve circulation and firm skin. **How to use**: For a daily serum, apply one to two pumps to clean skin to prep for foundation; you can also layer over night oils. For a quick mask, combine with a cleanser using a 2:1 ratio and let sit for 10 minutes before rinsing.
product>>name: Sunday Riley Good Genes All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment, 1 oz.

product>>description: Longing to capture the scent of her childhood vacations to Hawaii, founder Gaye Straza worked tirelessly with a small boutique fragrance house to create this tropical concoction. What started in 1999 as a single-batch perfume has grown into a cult-classic bath and body collection that evokes the balmy, sun- drenched Pacific Isles. **Kai Rose**: a light, intoxicating blend of white gardenia, wrapped in exotic florals and layered with rose absolute (FRESH)

Discover the French secret to beautiful skin. Darphin products are formulated with the finest botanicals and potent, natural ingredients harvested at their peak. Parisian kinesiotherapist and master botanist Pierre Darphin founded his beauty institute in 1958, believing that specific skin-sculpting massage techniques enhance the delivery of meticulously chosen natural ingredients into the skin, creating a unique beauty experience. Today, L' Institut Darphin in Paris remains the ultimate insider address for high performance products and rejuvenating facials. These beautifully aromatic formulas, free of parabens and phthalates, are the perfect blend of pleasure plus performance. Formulated for sensitive complexions, this soothing serum - employing a calming blend of chamomile, hawthorn and peony extracts - helps reduce the appearance of redness to reveal more even-looking tones. **How to use**: Both in the morning and at night, massage three pumps into face and neck. Follow with a moisturizing cream or balm.
product>>name: Darphin Intral Redness Relief Soothing Serum

product>>description: This luxurious, hypoallergenic sham protects delicate facial skin and hair from the scratches, creases and tugs caused by standard cotton, reducing split ends and ensuring a night of restorative beauty sleep.

Named after the Italian word for touch, fashion and fragrance house Tocca's exquisite scents evoke Old World romance and familiar places infused with the unexpected, fresh and new. Feminine through and through, their perfumes, scrubs and lotions are captured in charming vials and vessels that pretty up your dressing table along with your mystique. **Stella**: a flirtatious combination of sheer musk, white freesia, blood orange and spicy lily (FRESH) **Florence**: an alluring combination of Italian bergamot, crushed violet petals and blond wood (FLORAL) **Cleopatra**: rich amber patchouli blends royally with vanilla musk and hints of tuberose and grapefruit (SPICE) **Colette**: a lush mix of bergamot, citrus, juniper and pink peppercorn mingle with florals, musks and woods (FRESH) **Liliana**: sandalwood and patchouli are topped with Italian bergamot, gardenia and a hint of peach (FRESH) **Simone**: sparkling frangipani and sea salt unfold into a base of watermelon, ylang ylang and blond wood (FRESH) **Giulietta**: sweet top notes of ylang ylang, green apple and pink tulips bloom above a lily of the valley base (FLORAL)

Capri Blue's iconic vessels and fragrances - proudly designed and poured in Mississippi - are a long-standing favorite at Anthropologie. The line pairs striking visuals with intoxicating scents to create beautifully aromatic products like soy-blended candles and vegan-formulated beauty care. This luxurious hand cream is formulated with coconut oil and shea butter to smoothe and soften your skin - and it imparts the familiar Volcano fragrance of tropical fruits, sugared oranges, lemons and limes, redolent with exotic mountain greens.

Created by Kelley Hall-Barr and her husband John, Barr-Co. prides itself on creating eco-friendly, quality goods in small batches. Each original scent comes in a pretty, reusable package - think glass bottles, muslin bags and lidded tins - scripted with classic Americana typography. This delightful duo, housed in a wire basket, is designed to prettify your kitchen or bathroom countertop. **Original Scent**: milk, vanilla, oatmeal and vetiver **Honeysuckle**: a heady floral dosed with sweet nectar and herbaceous greens **Lemon Verbena**: bright and sunny, with lemony and green notes

The Lollia line offers lightly scented shower gels, triple-milled soaps, indulgent creams and romantic eaux de parfum, each handcrafted in the USA. Every lace- and flower-printed elixir is wistful and feminine, through and through. Hydrating shea butter is whipped with fragrant infusions to create this lusciously moisturizing hand cream and presented in a pretty floral box with a gift-ready paper sleeve. **Relax: **fresh notes of lavender and white orchid sweetened with Tahitian vanilla and honey **Wish: **a sweet bouquet of sugarcane, vanilla bean and jasmine **In Love: **apple blossom and jasmine, infused with timeless rose **At Last: **a soft, powdery floral with hints of southern magnolia and demure mimosa
product>>variations: In Love|Wish|Relax|At Last|In Love|Wish|Relax|At Last|In Love|Wish|Relax|At Last|In Love|Wish|Relax|At Last

product>>description: Created by Kelley Hall-Barr and her husband John, Barr-Co. prides itself on creating eco-friendly, quality goods in small batches. Each original scent comes in a pretty, reusable package - think glass bottles, muslin bags and lidded tins - scripted with classic Americana typography. Formulated with aloe, shea butter, cucumber and colloidal oatmeal, this therapeutic emulsion soothes irritated and itchy skin while helping maintain moisture. It sinks in, feels silky and leaves behind a fresh, clean scent that calms the senses. **Original Scent: **milk, oatmeal, vanilla and vetiver
product>>variations: Original Scent|Original Scent|Honeysuckle|Lemon Verbena|Original Scent|Original Scent|Original Scent

product>>description: A Middle English term meaning "although it be," Albeit is devoted to everyday glamour and the belief that confidence is a woman's greatest accessory. Exclusive to Anthropologie, the line invokes the Art Deco style of the 1920s and 30s, with products inspired by the romance, elegance, functionality and modernity of that era. Blended with moisturizing argan oil and antioxidant-rich vitamin E, this lightweight formula can be swiped on for a luminous splash of color, or layered for a high-impact pout. Give this trio of versatile, travel-ready hues to any makeup maven on your list. **Rosewood**: a rich, warm rose **Scarlet**: a classic neutral red **Violette**: a bright plum magenta with cool undertones
Pinch Provision's Minimergency kits have become a purse staple thanks to their well-packed primping emergency supplies in a neatly proportioned package.

The founders of Mer-Sea & Co. are inspired by the soulful rhythms and universal pleasures of the ocean - and its ability to bring calm, restoration and peace. Each hand-poured and mindfully packaged wash, scrub and lotion invokes salt air, sun-bleached dunes and hand-gathered bouquets - in short, the joys of a holiday in a summery seaside town. The **Sugar Scrub** is a gentle blend of raw sugar and nourishing oils that work to exfoliate and moisturize dry skin, leaving a non-oily, protective shield for sensitive skin. The original scrub from Mer-Sea & Co., the **Balm Scrub** brightens and invigorates dry, sull skin. Made with sea salt and a nourishing blend of oils and natural herb extracts, your skin will feel refreshed and moisturized after just one use. Finally, take an instant island vacation with this finely whipped **Sugar Whip Lotion** moisturizer, fragrant with Mer-Sea & Co.'s signature tropical scent.
